Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

{XML_SPECIES_HUMANS@RACE@DESCRIPTION_SHORT}[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000F]Firearms[/hyperlink] Weapons Group[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000010]Laser[/hyperlink] Weapons Group[/bullet][bullet]Deploy combat drones and turrets[/bullet][bullet]Use of propaganda and military force[/bullet][bullet]Powerful ranged units, weak melee capability[/bullet][/bulletList]

{XML_SPECIES_HUMANS@RACE@DESCRIPTION_SHORT}[br/][br/][bulletList][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E0000000F]枪炮[/hyperlink]武器组[/bullet][bullet][hyperlink,0000039E00000010]激光[/hyperlink]武器组[/bullet][bullet]部署战斗无人机和炮塔[/bullet][bullet]使用宣传和军事力量[/bullet][bullet]强力远程单位，近战能力较弱[/bullet][/bulletList]
The {text} inserts the DESCRIPTION_SHORT text below.

The [hyperlink,0000039E00000015]Vanguard[/hyperlink] consists of rough folk with few ties to society, so the effects of long interstellar travel in cryosleep and the resulting time dilation doesn’t matter to them.
[hyperlink,0000039E00000015]先锋[/hyperlink]由离群索居的粗糙之人组成，由于长期在冷冻休眠中进行星际旅行，所以因此而产生的时间膨胀对他们并无多大影响。
A settlement is a small independent colony that might join you if you have enough influence.
定居点是小型的独立殖民地，如果你拥有足够的影响力，定居点可能会加入你的势力。

Migrate the population of this colony to Vanguard. The colony will become an Vanguard colony.[br/][br/][fireCol]By migrating the population, {PopulationDeath} of the colonists of the colony will be killed.[/fireCol] [br/][br/]You receive:[br/][fireCol]{Reputation} Reputation[br/]{RaceRelation} Race Relation with the {STR_raceName}[/fireCol]
将殖民地的居民移民为先锋，之后该殖民地将变为先锋殖民地。[br/][br/][fireCol]迁移人口后，该殖民地 {PopulationDeath} 的移住民将会死亡。[/fireCol][br/][br/]你获得：[br/][fireCol]{Reputation} 声望[br/]与{STR_raceName}的种族关系 {RaceRelation}[/fireCol]
Colony is currently being migrated to an Vanguard population. Process will complete in [INT_duration].
殖民地正迁移为先锋殖民地，将于 [INT_duration] 后完成。
Are you sure you want to migrate this colony to an Vanguard colony?
确定要将该殖民地迁移为先锋殖民地？

“In ancient times, our ancestors rode bikes to freedom, claiming virtue in a life on the open road. Ancestral records show leather-clad mobs of two-wheeled ruffians decorated with the flaming skulls of their enemies. Some anthropologists believe the Assault Bike captures that instinctive melancholy—without the skulls, of course. The old bikes had no Laser Arrays capable of strafing mobs of enemy invaders or focusing all power onto a single target. One can only wonder if our ancestors ever would’ve left the open road had they these additional capabilities.”— Professor Quinlinn T. Ortivexis, “RV-4367H: Historical Parallels: Humanity’s Twisted Past”

“在古代，我们的祖先乘坐机车奔向自由，在宽广的大道上领悟了生命的真谛。历史记录显示曾有一群骑着两轮机车身穿皮革的暴徒，会将敌人的头骨点燃来作为机车上的装饰。一些人类学家认为突击机车充分体现了独特忧郁的气质，当然是说没有头骨作为装饰的时候。这些老旧的机车没有配备激光阵列，因此既不能扫射侵略而来的敌人暴徒，也不能将所有能量汇聚到单个目标之上。人们只能猜想，我们的祖先是否曾经离开了宽广的大道并获得了这些额外的能力。”- 奎里恩·T·奥迪威希斯教授，“RV-4367H：历史的相似之处：人类扭曲的过去”

“Technology exists to automate the Vanguard Trooper’s job, but how do you inspire a populace with no skin in the game? That philosophy was posited by emperors that needed humankind to sympathize with the price of war. Some suppose that the troopers are a tool of CORE, desperate criminals being forced to join its ranks. It has been my experience, however, that the deadliest trooper fights not to atone for his past, but to build a better future. For that, CORE and the emperors should be wary. They serve but never surrender.”— Quinlinn T. Ortivexis, “RV-4367H: Historical Parallels: Humanity’s Twisted Past”

“科技能够使先锋骑兵的工作变得自动化，但你要如何激励连皮肤都没有的士兵呢？帝皇们认为需要人类对战争的代价产生共鸣。一些人认为骑兵不过是核心的工具，认为他们不过是一群被迫加入的穷凶极恶之徒。但在我看来，就算是凶狠的骑兵也并非在为赎罪而战，而是为了创造更美好的未来。因此，核心和帝皇们都应该小心。他们虽然在服从，但却从未屈从。”- 奎里恩·T·奥迪威希斯，“RV-4367H：历史的相似之处：人类扭曲的过去”
Edit: Emperors -> emperors Edit: dash changed to comma Edit: semicolon changed to comma Edit: Emperors and CORE -> CORE and the emperors

“An Engineer’s job is never done. Soldiers get their downtime during the slow creep of space travel in cryosleep. I’m the one awakened when there’s a slight abnormality in system diagnostics. The Valkyries were older than me before we started this voyage. They remained blissfully preserved. Now I’m their senior by a decade. I outfit the hazmat-mech suits. I can fix anything. I can erect a laser turret. Once the Void FTL-comms failed, can anyone blame me for having a little fun with the system computers?”— Dren Gates, “RV-20456C: Building VR-Gaming Empires in your Starship’s AUX-compute core.”

“工程师的工作永远都没有尽头。士兵们会在太空旅行慢行期间进入冷冻休眠休息。当系统诊断中出现任何异常时，我都会被唤醒。在开始这段旅行前，那些瓦尔基里看上去比我老多了。她们的青春得到了保留，而我却已经比她们还要年长十岁了。我穿着危险机械防护服，什么都能修，还可以建造激光炮塔。当虚空 FTL 通讯失灵后，应该没有人会指责我用系统电脑找点乐子吧？”- 德里恩·盖茨，“RV-20456C：在你的星际飞船 AUX 电脑核心中搭建 VR 游戏帝国。”

“When Commander Abbott disappeared during the Mission of Comet Tomb, I was promoted to pilot his Walker. They say each mech has its own personality. Abbott wanted revenge. It terrified me. I screamed the first time I fired the Vulcan cannon. Gouts of life exploded before its barrage of bullets. Air-bound or hiding behind cover, the spindly finger smoke trails from the Walker’s frag-missile batteries left no survivors. I won accolades, but I tell you, the ghost of Commander Abbott lives on in his favorite mech.”— Captain Paxus Plexis, “RV-334M: Vanguard Encounters, Lost Colonies of the Water Nebula”

“当指挥官阿伯特在执行彗星坟墓任务期间失踪后，我就被晋升为了他的行者的驾驶员。他们说每一台行者都有其自己的个性。阿伯特想要复仇，这令我感到畏惧。我在第一次发射伏尔甘炮时吓得尖叫了起来。无数生命在它的弹幕下被轰得四分五裂。无论是在空中，还是躲在掩体后，当行者的破片导弹排炮开始轰击，从中传出阵阵青烟后，就绝不会有任何幸存者存在。我赢得了称赞，但我必须要说，指挥官阿伯特的灵魂就在这台他生前最喜爱的机甲之中”- 帕修斯·普雷西斯队长，“RV-334M：先锋遭遇战，失落的水星云殖民地”

“Pollux Moon Colony rejoiced to see the Vanguard Laser Tank among the supply convoy. For days, we hid in bunkers and prayed for armed relief. When the enemy returned, the townsfolk groaned, crying for fear that the tank was immediately damaged because a cloud of smoke enveloping the tank. Captain Paxus calmed the crowd. The tank was fine, he explained. Smoke obscures the tank, a defensive capability. He told us to avert our eyes, as the main gun began its deadly work.”— Mayor Delani D’Terni, “RV-333M: Vanguard Encounters, Lost Colonies of the Water Nebula”

“波勒克斯月亮殖民地看见供给车队中有先锋激光坦克而欣慰不已。这几天一来，我们一直躲在地堡中，祈祷着武装救援的到来。当敌人回来时，一团烟雾包裹住了坦克，居民们发出了叹息，担心坦克会因此受到伤害。帕修斯队长安抚了群众。‘坦克没有事，’他解释道，‘包围坦克的烟雾是一种防御手段’。他告诉我们把目光移开，因为致命的主火炮即将开工了。”- 德拉尼·德特尔尼市长，“RV-333M：先锋遭遇战，失落的水星云殖民地”

“Why did the Star Union dominate before the Collapse? It wasn’t their trade policies or the prosperity afforded to non-aggressors. No, they dominated by sheer power. At the height of its reach, the Empire’s Drone Carrier could launch drone swarms for distinct tactical purposes, whether it be for offense, medical, building or destroying obstacles, without the loss of a single marine. It is ironic that a race so horrified by the discovery of the swarm-like Kir’Ko could invent the deadliest swarm-capable weapon known across the galaxy.”— Professor Quinlinn T. Ortivexis, “RV-4368H: Historical Parallels: Humanity’s Twisted Past”

“为什么星际联盟在陨落前能够一直主宰？不是因为他们的贸易政策或是为非侵略者提供的繁荣，都不是。他们之所以能够主宰是因为他们掌握了无与伦比的力量。在帝国无人机航母的鼎盛时期，它能够为了不同的战术目的发动无人机群，无论是进攻、医疗、建造还是摧毁障碍物，并且不会损失任何一支舰队。说起来可真是讽刺，一个因发现虫群一样的奇尔寇而陷入了恐惧的种族，竟然自己发明了能够容纳像虫群一样致命无人机的载具。”- 奎里恩·T·奥迪威希斯教授，“RV-4368H：历史的相似之处：人类扭曲的过去”
Edit: attack -> for offense Edit: removed "space"

“Want to survive? Send in the OWL first. The little robot flies like a falcon - twice as high and just as fast. I won’t go in to a new location without the OWL first taking a look-see. Rumor has it, there are budget cuts coming. Sure, its laser is not much of a weapon, but it’s perfect for targeting enemies. My OWL prevented a dozen ambushes, and when it paints a target, my sniper rifle never misses. It is essential military gear. It’s easier to repair than a bullet through my head.”— Ensign Topher Erikson, “RV-222M: Vanguard Military Hardware Testimonial”

“想要活命？先派遣猫头鹰吧。这个小小的机器人就如同一只猎鹰，虽然高度是鹰的两倍，但速度不相上下。如果不事先派猫头鹰去勘察一下，我是不会去任何新地方的。有传言称，预算即将缩减。虽然它的激光算不上是个武器，但却非常适合标记敌人。我的猫头鹰帮助我躲过了许多次埋伏，当它标记出敌人后，我的狙击枪从没有失手过。它是我至关重要的军事装备，而且十分容易修理。”- 海军少尉托非尔·埃里克森，“RV-222M：先锋军事硬件推荐信”

“Ensign Arnie thought it would be funny to prank Sarge. So he stuffed his dessert rations into the Healing Charge of the Sarge’s PUG. I think he just forgot about it. A month later we were ambushed by bugs, and Sarge gets hit. His PUG was working fine. It was blurred and returning fire with its blasters—all’s good, until Sarge calls for medical. Normally, it’d heal him right up, but instead it sprayed him with chocolate pudding. That’s when the battle took a turn for the worse.”— Lieutenant Lenny Sasse, “RV-333M: Court-martial of Ensign Arnie Malarkin”

“阿尔尼海军少尉认为整蛊萨尔基是一件很有趣的事，所以他把自己的甜点口粮塞到了萨尔基的巴哥治疗电荷中。我认为他就是把这件事情给忘了。一个月后，我们遭到了虫子的偷袭，萨尔基受伤了。他的巴哥运作正常，它快速地移动并用爆能枪进行反击。一切都很正常，直到萨尔基请求医疗救助。通常情况下，它会立刻对他进行治疗，而不是向他喷洒一堆巧克力布丁。这场战斗也是从那时起开始变得糟糕起来。”- 莱尼·沙斯中尉，“RV-333M：海军少尉阿尔尼·马拉尔金的军事法庭审判”

“My story ends with me swallowed by a big bug. The thing poops out larvae, and I think, ‘What a waste! Am I going to end up as a slimy bug?!’ I’m smothered in the pitch-black acidic undulations of its digestive tract. It’s enough to make the least religious pray. Then, I see a light. Before me, holding a sword of burning light, floats an angel. She lobs a flash grenade, blinding the angry swarm. I’ll never forget when I died and was delivered by an angel: a Vanguard Valkyrie.”— Mah Reg’Nib, Observer Officiate: “RV-771X: Nectar Run: The Price of Power”

“我的故事在我被一只大虫子吞掉后就一起结束了。当时那东西正在向外排卵，我心想：‘真可惜！难道我最后会变成一只黏糊糊的虫子吗？！’它满是酸液的漆黑消化道令我窒息，但我还可以进行最后一次宗教祈祷。随后，我看到了一道光芒。我的面前漂浮着一位手持发光长剑的天使，她抛出一颗闪光弹，致盲了愤怒的虫群。我永远也不会忘记我死亡的那一刻，并且被一名天使所带走：先锋瓦尔基里。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，观察者长官：“RV-771X：花蜜奔跑：力量的代价”
Edit: What waste?! I am going to be a slimy bug!? -> What a waste! Am I going to end up as a slimy bug?! Edit: an -> the Edit: angel--A -> angel: a

“The refugees couldn’t communicate with air support. We just fled. They flew in formation, eight Vanguard Gunships. They drew fire from our flying pursuers. The Vanguard built those gunships to repel hostile fliers. I thought I had a clear shot until I ran into a line of hostiles blocking our retreat. The gunships mowed down the lines easily. The fools didn’t realize that Vanguard Gunships specialize in strafing fools in long lines too. If I ever get a chance, I’d buy those pilots a drink.”— Mah Reg’Nib, Observer Officiate: “RV-770X: Nectar Run: The Price of Power”
“难民无法与空中支援取得联系，我们只能逃跑。八艘先锋炮艇以方阵形式飞行，吸引那些追击者的火力。先锋制造这些炮艇就是为了对抗敌对飞行物。我以为我的目标很明确，直到一排敌人拦住了我们的撤退线路。炮艇轻而易举地解决掉了他们。那群白痴不知道先锋炮艇也十分擅长消灭排成一列的敌人。如果有机会的话，我真想请那群飞行员喝一杯。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，观察者长官：“RV-770X：花蜜奔跑：力量的代价”

“Is your Drone Carrier loaded or empty? Don’t be caught without the latest in high-tech disposable drone weaponry. Treat your enemies to the Sportican Assault Drone 4000 model stinger, now with detailing options in Red, Scarlet, Vermillion or Crimson Laser. Nothing charges your succubot’s batteries better than a well-equipped soldier with a full accoutrement of deadly drones. Lay down suppressive fire, quell rebellions with lethal force, and blast your way to victory!”— Unknown, “RV-14A: Adworxs Paragon Portables Advertising Agency”

“你的无人机航母是否已经载满了无人机？如果你没有这个最尖端的一次性无人机武器，可千万不要埋怨被敌人抓住了。让你的敌人尝尝斯波帝卡进攻无人机 4000 型毒刺的威力吧，现在更有红色、猩红色、朱砂色和深红色四种颜色激光可供选择。没有什么比一名装备精良且配备了致命无人机的士兵更能让你的机械姬电池充满能量的东西了。发射压倒性的火力，用致命的部队镇压反抗，一路轰向胜利！”- 未知,“RV-14A：阿多沃克斯完人便携装置广告机构”

“After a hard day of suppressing alien flora and fauna, nothing brightens a commando’s spirit more than the soothing sparkle of the highest quality Repair Drones. Don’t let your men bleed out, or their gear rust. Deploy the latest in high-tech disposable medical drones. Treat yourself and your equipment to the soothing nanite healing that comes from the Medivac Repair Drone 4000, now with detailing options in Blue, Cyan, Cerulean or Azul healing glow. Nothing tells the troops you approve of their atrocities more effectively than total healing.”— Unknown, “RV-15A: Adworxs Paragon Portables Advertising Agency”

“在与外星动植物进行了一整天的战斗之后，没有什么比从质量最好的修理无人机中投射出的光芒更能点亮一位指挥官灵魂的东西了。不要让你的手下流血或是让他们的装备生锈。试试最尖端的一次性医疗无人机吧。梅迪瓦克修理无人机 4000 型放射出的纳米粒子不仅能够复原你的装备，还能治疗你的身体。现有更有蓝色、青色、深蓝色或蔚蓝色四种治愈光芒可供选择。没有什么比提供完备的治疗服务更能表现你对手下成绩的认可了。”- 未知，“RV-15A：阿多沃克斯完人便携装置广告机构”

“Tired of taking all the punches? Why not let the deep-strike specialization Rambot Drones take a crack at your enemy? Sit back and sip a mind-bendingly smooth Nectar Mai Tai while the latest in kinetic ram jack-hammer technology drills holes into your enemy’s lines… or better yet, through the enemy’s torso! Sold in percussive waves of the highest quality Zybranium-steel driller-drones with detailing options in your choice of hues, including: Goldenrod, Marigold or Sunflower. Watch your enemies turn yellow and run.”— Unknown, “RV-16A: Adworxs Paragon Portables Advertising Agency”

“厌倦了正面应敌？何不尝试一下用专精于深度打击的拉姆博特无人机给你的敌人搞点破坏？坐下来，喝一口宁神静心的花蜜鸡尾酒，与此同时装备了最新款动力冲压气锤技术的无人机则在你敌人阵线中开出了一道口子…或者，直接穿透了敌人的躯干！快来购买能够产生大量冲击，使用兹布兰钢制作的最尖端钻头无人机吧，现有多种颜色可供选择，包括：暗金菊色、金盏花色和向日葵色。看着你的敌人因恐惧四散而逃吧。”- 未知，“RV-16A：阿多沃克斯完人便携装置广告机构”
Edit: removed commas after "Tai" and "ram" Edit: goldenrod, marigold or sunflower -> Goldenrod, Marigold or Sunflower

“Rumor reached me of a land called Felinar where the natives revered cats as gods. Naturally, I thought it the ideal place for my cat. I hitched a ride with a Vanguard Frigate patrol. Surprisingly, the natives mobbed us. Their faces were strained with desire. They leered at my darling kitty. I’d made a terrible mistake. These savages adored cats only as food. It was a trap! The Vanguard Frigate unleashed a multi-laser barrage, burning a clear swathe through the throng of cat-carnivores. That’s why Mister McFlufflepants loves the Vanguard.”— Astro Cattovio, Children’s Book Author, “RV-00495E: McFlufflepants Travels Abroad”

“有传言称有一个地方叫菲里纳尔，那里的原住民将猫视为神明。所以，我认为那里非常适合我的猫咪居住。于是我跳上了一艘正在巡逻的先锋护卫舰，搭了一趟顺风车。令人意外的是，当地人竟然袭击了我们。他们的脸上满是欲望。他们不怀好意地盯着我心爱的小猫咪。我犯下了一个致命的错误，在这些野蛮人眼里，猫只是食物罢了，传言是个陷阱！先锋护卫舰发射了一道多重激光弹幕，将这些食猫族全部烧成了灰烬。这就是迈克弗鲁潘茨先生喜欢先锋的原因。”- 阿斯特罗·卡托维奥，儿童读物作家，“RV-00495E：克弗鲁潘茨游记”
Edit: taut -> strained Edit: frigate -> Frigate

“Our Captain cursed the intercom static, demanding engineering’s reply. Judging from the crater in the ship where the engines used to be, I knew there would be no reply. A jarring boom sent the lead marauder’s ship flying in three directions. Missiles tore it apart. A Vanguard Battleship loomed out of the smoke. Its cannons blasted a second ship, while its missile launchers reloaded. We hailed it, hoping for lifeboats, but the Battleship unleashed a sparkling charge of warmth over us. The hole in our ship sealed, as microscopic nanites knit everything back together.”— Sheldon Zaragoza, “RV-39761M: Vanguard Justice”

“我们的舰长朝着对讲机发出的静电干扰一通臭骂，要求工程部立即回应。原本飞船引擎所在的位置已经变成了一个大坑，我想已经不会有人回应他了。一阵巨大的爆炸声响，领头的劫掠者船只向三个方向碎落而去。不知哪里的导弹将它轰成了碎片。这时，一艘先锋战列舰从浓烟中出现，向敌人的第二艘船只发起了炮轰，导弹发射器同时开始填弹。我们向它挥手，希望它能投来救生艇，但战列舰却向我们投来了一阵温暖的火花电荷。微小的纳米机器人不仅修复了我们船体的破洞，还令整艘船如获新生。”- 谢尔顿·扎拉格扎，“RV-39761M：先锋正义”

“Though our weapons are strong and we fight like devils, we are called Inferno Troopers because we are the elite fighting force of the Vanguard, willing to jump into the very mouth of hell to complete our commander’s orders. We may be cursed to burn for all eternity in the infernal pits, but we’ll take as many nasties along with us on the way down.”— Tek Bertlam, Special Forces: Inferno Trooper, “RV-854M: Order of Operations”
“虽然我们武器精良，战斗犹如恶魔般凶狠，但我们之所以被称为炼狱骑兵，是因为我们是先锋的精英战斗部队。为了完成指挥官的命令，就算是刀山火海我们也会纵身跳入。我们可能会被诅咒在地狱的陷坑中永远遭受燃烧，但在下去之前，我们将带上路途中所有肮脏污秽之物。”- 特克·波特拉姆，特种部队：炼狱骑兵，“RV-854M：行动命令”

“Like most engineers, I’d much rather automate my job so that I can work on my side projects. It’s nothing personal about the bosses, but they’re stupid. I’m no combat soldier! So, I assembled my fellow engineers and coded a targeting computer. Put it on a turret, change this variable to indicate a machine gun, laser blaster, or a rocket launcher, and it shoots the baddies. I mean, do you really want me, with my bad vision and posture, anywhere near a gun?”— Dren Gates, “RV-21000C: Building VR-Gaming Empires in a Targeting Computer.”

“与大多数工程师一样，我也更希望自己的工作能够自动化处理，这样我就能忙一些副业了。我并不是针对那些领导，但他们真是蠢到家了。我又不是战斗士兵！所以，我集结了手下的工程师，对目标电脑进行了编程。然后将它放置在一个炮塔上，改变这个变量，它就能变成机关枪、激光爆能枪或是火箭发射器，而且还能攻击敌人。我的意思是，你真的希望像我这种视力和身体的人拿一把枪去作战吗？”- 德伦·盖茨，“RV-21000C：在目标电脑建造 VR 游戏帝国。”

Valor and strength to you, Commander of the Vanguard Expeditionary Forces! Cryosleep missions allowed you and your ranks of outcasts and adventurers to escape your past and claim new worlds for the Star Union. But while you were sleeping, the Empire disappeared. You will need all your combat and survival skills to face the forces that brought down the Union. The past is about to catch up with you, Commander!
愿英勇与力量与你同在，先锋远征军指挥官！冷冻休眠任务本是让你和你手下这群被遗弃的冒险者摆脱过去，并为星际联盟开拓新的世界。但在你们休眠期间，帝国消失了。你们必须充分利用自己的战斗和生存能力来面对瓦解星际联盟的力量。你的过去就要追上你了，指挥官！

This text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

VO: Empress Carminia - Female
Edit: filled with -> of Edit: added comma after "sleeping" Edit: "the empire you served has disappeared" -> "the Empire disappeared"

“The operations manual said that it would spray the area with a light refracting obscuring agent called Lumitol. I don’t know if that’s the chemical that kept the enemy fire from seeing us, or if it was the healing agent that stopped my bleeding, but I must confess I would be much more willing to help fight this war if there were more Support Stations along the way.”— Ensign Doohan ‘Red Shirt’ McGee, “RV-957M: All the Best Gadgets and the Men who Love Them.”
“行动手册上说它会向区域喷射一种被称为鲁米托的光线折射隐藏剂，我不知道是不是那种化学物质使我们消失在了敌人的火力视线内，也不清楚是不是它让我的伤口止住了流血。但我必须承认，如果一路上还有更多这样的纳米支援站的话，我的战斗热情将会更加高涨。”- 海军少尉多汉“红衣”麦吉，“RV-957M：最好的装置以及爱它们的人。”

“Like most engineers, I’d much rather automate my job so that I can work on my side projects. It’s nothing personal about the bosses, but they’re stupid. I’m no combat soldier! So, I assembled my fellow engineers and coded a targeting computer. Put it on a turret, change this variable to indicate a machine gun, laser blaster, or a rocket launcher, and it shoots the baddies. I mean, do you really want me, with my bad vision and posture anywhere near a gun?”—Dren Gates, “RV-21000C: Building VR-Gaming Empires in a Targeting Computer.”

“与大多数工程师一样，我也更希望自己的工作能够自动化处理，这样我就能忙一些副业了。我并不是针对那些领导，但他们真是蠢到家了。我又不是战斗士兵！所以，我集结了手下的工程师，对目标电脑进行了编程。然后将它放置在一个炮塔上，改变这个变量，它就能变成机关枪、激光爆能枪或是火箭发射器，而且还能攻击敌人。我的意思是，你真的希望像我这种视力和身体的人拿一把枪去作战吗？”- 德伦·盖茨，“RV-21000C：在目标电脑建造 VR 游戏帝国。”
Repeater Defense Turrets are the Vanguard colony defense turrets.
连发防御炮塔是先锋殖民地的防御炮台。
